text: hello, do you like to donate?
Donate? Donate to what?
donate to charities?
I usually do not donate to charities. Do you represent a charity?
yes, why you dont  donate to charities?
Transparency. Or the lack thereof. I don't know how the charity will use the money.
i understand you, i have to say that the charity i represent does have transparency.
Ok. Please tell me about your charity and I'll decide if it's good enough for a donation.
the charity is named save the children, they help children all around the world and in usa.
Save the Children? I've never heard of it. Is it well known?
yes they help millions of children every year.
How do they help these children? I need to know much more before I donate.
they see who needs more help and they buy them clothes, food , provide shelter and take them to school.
There are many organizations that do that kind of thing. Why is Save the Children worth my donation?
they do everything with open papers, they now are helping Hawaii with the hurricane, providing them with food,clothes, everything else.
Ok. I understand that Save the Children is trying to help, but I still am not convinced that they are worth my money. I can give to other organizations.
so you will not donate?
I don't really want to give money to an organization that I don't know much about. I don't think my money will be used well.
ok, thank you for your answer
Were you planning to donate to Save the Children?
